Text: Thank you -- end of the series -- too bad but it was great while it lasted.
@scottielass from wat my sources have told me this won't be the last we hear from mary edith and sybil
Thanks to TvTeam and other uploaders for this excellent series from ITV, UK.
Yes, Bomb6454, you're right, there will be another series later in 2011 - something to look forward to.
I wonder if this uploader is planning to bring us the remake of Upstairs Downstairs, which starts on the BBC tonight? Wishful thinking!
Thanks so much! Will seed, cheers!
